name: @alexgritton/nativescript-facebook
description: NativeScript plugin, wrapper of native Facebook SDK for Android and iOS.

scripts.build: npm i && tsc && tns plugin build && npm run ngc
scripts.build.iosOnly: npm i && tsc && npm run ngc
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android

author: NativeScript Team
